About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hello, My name is La'Daisha Pettus and I am a Junior Software Engineer at Road To Hire. I am 23 years old and I was born and raised in Rock Hill, SC. I'm pursuing my bachelors degree in computer science at Southern New Hampshire University with hopes of one day having my own team of developers. I have a passion for Technology and Design. I enjoy the thought process behind designing and building a website but most importantly, bringing it to life. I strive daily to be a positive role model for my 4 year old daughter but also for other young developers stepping into this field.

Road to Hire

Software Engineer

06/2019-Current

I am a student in the road to hire program learning how to be a fullstack engineer. During the last 4 months I have learned several coding languages and libraries such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, BootStrap, JQuery, React, MYSQL, Node, Express, Mocha, Chai, and MongoDB. I have built several applications in each language including a full stack Ecommerce website.

Created Commission codes for sales representatives to determine they're percentae of pay. Once the codes we're created I communicated the information via email to all reps involved. Also, Processed a large quantity of sensitive documents in a timely and professional matter for records keeping.
